Question: LOTUS ROBOTICS CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lotus Robotics

Product: ROBO Soul Full Self-Driving Software Stack

- Offers up to Level 4 self-driving capability
- Can be integrated into any vehicle
- Underpinned by ROBO Galaxy, a cloud-based suite for fleet management
- Utilizes real-time monitoring for remote assistance with ROBO Matrix
- Showcased modular V1 chassis for autonomous driving software
- Offers Robocube, an intelligent cleaning robot with Level 4 autonomous driving software for sidewalk operation
